content.detailedDescription: Saturday, 2/9/13 at 6:05pm. i was bbq in my backyard, noticed a purple light in the sky to the east heading west.. the light went stationary and started pulsating different colors. they ranged from purple, blue, green, orange and yellow. the object proceeded south, stopped and than started to head north all while changing colors. stopped again, hovered for about 25 seconds than proceeded west torwards my direction. i ran in the house and told my wife to come out and take a look. her responce was holy s***. she than ran in the house to tell my son and also his friend. we all saw the object. the object had to be less then a mile away before heading east torwards sacramento. lost visual in the tress. approx 5min. later a plane flew by in the same direction as the object moving a lot faster. i heard the plane this other thing no sound at all with an amazing display of pulsating lights.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Generating random colors, pulsating, changing direction, stationary at times.

content.detailedDescription:
At the time of the event i was sat in my living from doing vocal preparation for a class that i was going to teach the next day. my dog was sat next to me on the sofa until he got up quickly and barked franticly at the window before running to the front door, as if he had seen something. i got up and checked and saw nothing. my tv and radio connection also did any internet connection that we had. while taking a look at the plugs and the cables my girlfriend came down complaining that she could hear a rumbling noise from out of the bathroom window that lasted for about 30 seconds. we started to see an extremely bright, clouded light out side the window that lit up our garden, we both ran down to the back door and looked out, the dog still hysterically barking outside. i saw a weirdly shaped dark object that seemed to be hovering in a stationary in one place over the top of the street. our garden was no longer lit so it was obvious that it had ascended higher into the sky. at this point we made our way outside and watched it for about and tried to contact a friend down the street on the phone but it wasn't working. i haven't seen or heard of any kind of aircraft like it in my life as i used to be in the air force. soon after it seemed to ascend higher into the sky, and suddenly shot into nowhere. i never took my eye of the object however it seemed to have disappeared at a shocking speed.

we headed back indoors and i quickly drew what i had seen, within the hour our phone started to work again and we received calls from two people down the street who had seen the same thing. we realised that our dog was no where around the house and could not find him in the gardens. we walked the streets most of the night trying to find him. about 4 pm the next day he was found outside the door. he was not the same as he normally was and seemed depressed and made no noise and had a mark above his tale where it looks like his fur had been burned, like he ran past a flame and with left with painful raw skin. no one in our small street said that they had seen him out last night. and no sightings of fire. i have never seen anything like this and the sighting terrified my girlfriend and myself. for the last day, i feel different as my voice seems higher as well as i feel that being shocked at the time, mentally effected me, my girlfriend and other people down the street, its upsetting as we have no answers.
content.shape: Disc,   Egg,   Oval,   Teardrop,   Other,   Unknown
content.summary: Bright lights and a unusual shaped solid object, rumbling and humming noise affected animals in the house.

content.detailedDescription: Went out to eat with wife and 2 friends in rochester ny. after dinner while leaving my wife said what the f@#k are those. we all saw them and were confused. six other people were in the parkinglot and saw them too.  we watched as three formed a triangle, followed by a fourth. kinda formed an arrow of sorts. then the rear light caught up to the front three, and they all formed a diangle line. traveled for about 3 minutes then dissapeared one at a time startind with the front one. if these were the size of planes i would say they were 60 miles away, and traveled about 75-100 miles in 5 min.  we have the phone video and a phone still, the still when zoomed in on revieled 10 more in the background that were not visible to the naked eye, and there appears to be an edge or a ridge that connected the seen ones to the unseen ones. they appear to have the same qualities as the pheonix lights, and many other videos i watched on youtube.The color was hard to describe, i called it fire color, although there was no tails i first thought meteorite, then helecoptors (no sound), then flares (did not decend but assended slightly. i have no idea what they really were.
content.summary: Fire in color, formed a formation, changed speed (one did, to catch up?)caught on video and still

content.detailedDescription:
Driving home after early movie years ago.  came to stop sign at said intersection.  saw enormous object hovering over tree tops and several homes.   looked at it for a minute, was frighened so continued down the street.  turned car around in condos on left side of road.  drove back but it was gone.  no sound...Just gone.  my husband was in the car behind me and wittnesed it as well.

willing to try hypnosis to remember specific details and or lie detector test
content.summary: Enormous silent hovering object, (3) norelco razor shaped lights...Many groupings of (3) on bottom kept driving looked back it was gone

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: Only tell by phone or in person.
content.summary: Only tell by phone or in person.

content.detailedDescription: Visiting my father in marietta i went out onto his balcony to smoke a cigarette. as i always do; looked up at the stars. i then began to notice something out of the ordinary through the trees. at first it seemed as though the "star" was twinkling because of the wind through the branches. then as i watched it closer i noticed slight movement. finally out from the trees... my attention for the next hour and a half was captured. after slight movment was abrupt movement! from the right to left, then hovering for 45 minutes more then made its way slowly back to the right, then began to descend downward at an angle. i thought it was strange from the beginning because once it abruptly moved; 5 minutes later a plane appeared. it seemed to cross right underneath it. within this time, i showed my dad. he said it was strange and looked through the binoculars as well, but the cold weather pushed his curiousity away. so i moved inside the sliding door, proped my elbows on the bar and pushed the binoculars against the window to secure the object in eyesite. when i noticed it was descending slowly then i was really convinced i wasnt just seeing things. ive seen two sitings before here in marrietta and both late at night. but oddly enough it seems to be in the same direction. also somewhat near the airforce base. which convinces me further that it is some type of aircraft. over the years ufo's have become a huge interest of mine but often i try to create scientific explainations. although, sometimes i just cant seem to rule out the possibility. once descended, it then dissappeared. the show began around 130, and ended at 245. next thing i know im sitting here on the couch typing this story. im grateful for what ive witnessed, but there seems to be some hot spot around here. as i watched it.. i really, truley, realized that it was descending after hovering for so long, and all the colors that flashed with it i was baffeled. ive questioned the other sites but this one made the book.
content.summary: Observed over an hour on balcony w. binoculars. once noticed placement was made compared to stars and tree branches

content.detailedDescription: Walking down the driveway facing south, a sudden flash of light in the south sky lit up the street ahead of me for a brief second, and the light moved swiftly - vanishing. i first thought it was a falling star, but i never saw one flash a light on the ground. almost like a bright white flash bulb in the sky. it was so unusual that for some reason i merely started to laugh as i kept walking to my car at the end of the driveway. it quickly was sinking in that i saw something quite amazing especially how the ground was illuminated.
content.summary: Flash of light in the night sky that illuminated the ground around me

content.detailedDescription:
We were driving south on our way home at 10:15pm central time and we came upon a clearing where we saw a cluster of lights. at first, we thought they were lights from a cell tower or some similar structure. however, we then noticed that they were the wrong color and there were too many for it to be a tower. we quickly pulled over to watch and noticed that there were 10 orange lights in triangular or diamond formations. like this:
               -                     -                           -

-                          -                        -                             -

               -                     -                           -
the lights hovered for a few seconds and then slowly began to travel ne. they traveled more slowly than a plane, but much faster than a blimp or bird. we watched them for about 10 minutes as each one slowly faded, starting with the one that appeared to be leading the rest, until they had all disappeared. each light disappeared individually and each seemed to begin to fade when it reached the exact same spot in the sky. initially, we thought the lights were disappearing behind a cloud. however, they neither reappeared further along the skyline, nor did they shine through at any point as would be expected if they went behind a cloud. we attempted to capture the lights on our iphone camera, but they were either too small or not bright enough to be picked up by our phone cameras.  we were excited to see something so strange.
content.summary: 10 orange balls of light hovered in triangular formation then slowly traveled ne and faded one by one

content.detailedDescription: We were walking our dog east and we noticed 6 red lights in north east direction above the foot hills of north lake forest ca. the objections we in creating a pattern/line formation, then they shifted closer together. they were higher 1000 ft. then a helicopter was flying towards them and they pulsated and 2 disapeared. then the other 4 changed direction and pulsated and then vanished. then the helicopter turned around and took off back towards the south west.
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 6 red large lights hovering in pattern

content.detailedDescription: I was talking to my girlfriend on the phone. i saw a bright glowing light an trail as it came down it has before near my house my friends next door have seen ufos before but this is the second one that has happened right by my house.I turned all the lights off in my room an looked at it carefully to make out details of the colors an size of the object. the object was glowing red on the outside as trail behind it disapared as it hoovered over builting near my house an in the middle of the ufo their were 6 red flashing lights as the rest of it was glowing. this is the first sighting of this year i have seen a ufo i saw three last year within a month an got under one large black triangle , just a few days ago i read the reports that nothing was happening in our area but the sighting have been high this month an i'm not talking my self into this it was a legit ufo i've seen a good amount i think an i like ufo i know what to look for so for seeing a ufo this year was really cool again i got so happy but quickly put my eys to what i was seeing an what time it started. how i lost sight of the object is that it came in very bright an then faded out like it was never their but it was extremely low to the trees an the left.
content.summary: Bright red light with a black backround flashing light an glowing saw it out of the side of my eye then turned all the lights in my room an faded out after that it was for sure outside i have nothign red in my room.

content.detailedDescription: While at work on patrol duty i went to the front guard shack and checked in when i came back outside and sat in the truck i observed two large objects glowing reddish orange ascend, one on the left height then the right one and once they got so far up the left object hovered until the right one was next to it and the both were hovering and then left one led the way going in a south easterly direction quickly disappearing.
content.summary: Arrived at guard shack when i got back saw two objects rise

content.detailedDescription: I went out on my balcony of my apartment to get some fresh air in bellingham, washington. i opened the door and immediately saw these six lights flying strangely close together yet not straight across in a line. i opened the door and yelled for my husband to come out with me. i don't know what they were but knew they were not anything i had ever seen before and i am 60 years old. he was just inside the door watching tv. he came right out and saw the light formations too. i said "what are they?" he responded "has to be ufo's." i said "no, no such thing as ufo's." then i saw them going up and down and across but close together. they were all moving both horizontally and vertically across the sky. i said "could they be some kind of a helicopter formation?" of course i didn't think they were since they were to close at times and would have collided. my husband said "no, look they are to close to each other." by then the lights were starting to all go up and above the cloud cover. they each disappeared above the clouds and were gone. this lasted about a minute or so. (the whole episode of my hubby and i questioning what they were.)
content.summary: Saw six bright lights moving both horizontally and vertically across the night sky and they disappered about the clouds

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home heading west on loop 1604 in san antonio.  i was talking to my wife on the phone when i see a shooting star.  i hang up with my wife and continue driving.  i noticed cars on the side of the road but i thought they had just broken down.  i then turn north and witness more cars pulled over.  i turn west again and look up and see a cluster of red lights in the sky.  i try my best not to take my eyes off of the them.  i pull over and grab my iphone and attempt to take video.  the video only shows black since camera phones are meant to record at such distances.  i observe the objects moving in different directions.  one starts to pick up speed and is moving directly over me.  the rest are still clustered together.  the light above me suddenly disappears.  i continue observing the cluster but they seem to be fading away one by one.  suddenly they are all gone.
content.summary: Cluster of about 10 red lights appeared in the sky.  various witnesses pulled over watching them.

content.detailedDescription: Myself and my children coming home and we see a very bright round light in the bush, (paddock,treed area)about tree level, we thought a farm light but not possible in its location,seemed to be hovering and moving very slowly as we drove, we drove about 10km with the light still visible,lost sight of it, we arrived home and saw the light again even though we originally saw 20km away. then it just seems to vanish.
content.summary: Very bright hovering moving light

content.detailedDescription: Daughter and myself were driving downn main rd and to the left of us in paddock was a very bright red orb? i always keep my eye on the rd but something made me look out my daughters window. it was very low in the paddock which is hilly, very grey overcast stormy day. my daughter was bewildered but made me feel excited, something so close! had to look back to the rd and it just vanished.
content.summary: Bright red light seen in paddock

content.detailedDescription: Iwas exiting my car and looked up to view an airliner in the process of landing at the airport. the plane was just about to disappear behind the roof of a house when i continued my gaze higher to look at the night sky as it was a exceptionally clear night. i didn't initially see the objects in motion until they crossed my vision. i did't see them approaching until almost in front of me but they became clearer and brighter as they got right above me, almost like the reason i didn't see them right away was because of the flatter angle to my right.As they moved from west to east what initially looked like a shadow moving from right to left became clearer right overhead and in a direct line of sight. two triangular shaped objects, identical in size with rounded corners, moved in formation at what could best be described as a leisurely pace. given the approximate altitude they didn't seem to be more than 1200 feet off the ground and moving faster than a small plane. two things stand out though, they're positions in relation to each other did not vary considering how close they were to each other and they made no sound and that really made an impression on me. as they moved from right to left,they faded from my view almost within 500 line feet and i can only guess that as their departing angle increased they faded from view. i knew right away as to what i had just seen and went inside to tell my wife. going back outside to see if something like that were to happen again would be like finding the proverbial needle in the haystack. i already had found the needle and it was in my hand.
content.summary: Two triangular shaped objects moving in formation from east to west.

content.detailedDescription: I was in the house and heard a rumbling noise and thought it was a plane that was low but when i looked out it did not look like a plane so i watched it a bit more. at first it was going round in circles then stopped suddenly and shot away then came back and hovered all this time it was keep changing colours, from white to red to green to blue. i was very scared yet excited i told my friends and family. it shot away again and then came back and hovered a bit again then vanished.
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Scary but strange, it hovered and moved and changed colours.

content.detailedDescription: I was on front porch smoking and looking at the stars. where i live i can see air traffic from sfo oak airports napa county airport and travis air force base so i know what navigation lights should look like. when the orb came above the house across the street i knew it was nothing ive seen before.The size was much bigger than any star that was visible. it was the size of a full moon.The color was not deep red but a reddish orange flickering or pulsating.It was going from nw to se about the same speed as a low flying single engine airplane but making no sound at all.It had no distinct shape or hard edges.As i watched it going away the orb was getting smaller and dimmer.Before it disapeared all i could see was a red cross pointed on each end but the bottom point looked as if it was dripping blood.I lost sight as it moved away into the distance.When it was gone i was excited after finally seeing something i could not identify.I rushed into the house to tell my wife i didnt bring her outside because she was sitting on the toilet and i would have to put her in her wheelchair to bring her outside to see it. idid not want to miss it not for 1 second.I wanted to make the most accurate report as possible.
content.summary: Standing on front porch smoking and looking at stars. saw large red orb come into view above house across the street

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home home when i saw a huge flash coming from the ground.  i was traveling towards the atlantic ocean.  i asked my daughter if she had seen it, we both looked over to that direction and a second flash, bright green, came from the ground .  i had my window down and heard a man in the next car yell, what the hell was that!   we live near oceana air force base and dam neck base where jets, planes, helicopters, black hawks flashing lights and explosions are not uncommon.   it was not any of these!   after mentioning it, a woman told me her sister lived on oceana af base and she had seen the same thing two years ago and they could never figure out what it was.  it was not at the af base but was so huge could be seen from the base.  it emanated from over the atlantic ocean.  we were a few miles from the oceanfront, it was an extremely huge flash, it appeared to be at least a mile wide and mile high. after living here for over 15 years i have never seen anything like it! this happened on feb 10 2013 in virginia beach, va about 7pm.
content.summary: 2 huge bright green flashes appeared to be mile or more wide from from atlantic ocean

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were inside the house and heard a weird noise that sounded like it was coming from the garden. looking out of the window we were immediately drawn to two red/orange circular lights in the sky...Traveling what looked like north to south, appearing to be heading towards the ground. they seemed to be traveling together, not to or from the airport, lax which is super close! they seemed to have their own groove, not like the airplanes, a slight back and forth movement whilst traveling, looking like heading towards the ocean? when we see the planes, they give a white light, not a red light! there was a haze...Maybe because the ocean and full sky as a background? we absolutely could not identify them as being aircraft that we are used to seeing. was a very strange sight in all. never seen anything like that before! we came inside and went straight onto the computer to see if there were any reports of them..We know there's meteor activity out there right now...But we came across your site instead so decided to submit a report. i wish i had grabbed my ipad to record it, will be on the lookout and film again if we see again!
content.summary: My husband and i heard a noise we looked out the window and saw 2 big bright red circles with a orange haze descending south

content.detailedDescription:
February 15,2012 @ about 1950. just west of hodges blvd. on beach blvd. jacksonville, fl. two bright orange lights in south-western sky. they were separated horizontally at about 45 degrees and maybe a mile or so vertically. the bottom light was to the left of the top light. i watched them for a few minutes and the bottom light started moving to the right. when it was almost lined up with the top light, the top light started to move south-west very rapidly. the bottom light started moving south-west also a few seconds after the first. they both moved extremely fast and disappeared in the distance.

i left the spot where i first spotted the lights and drove about two minutes or so (in a golf cart) to another part of the housing development. i made a right on another road and the two objects were back in the same part of the sky. i drove back to the original spot. they were arranged different. the top one was to the left of the bottom. they sped off tho the south-west again. amazing!

the second time i saw them, there were two other people watching the lights. we did not speak.
content.summary: Two bright orange lights in sky. spoeed off to south-west, return and depart same direction.

content.detailedDescription:
Sited at delaware and adams --huntington bch. at 10 am feb 15, 2013

two orb objects moving from the nw toward the ocean---
they were orange red and moving together---no sound
content.summary: two orbs the color of red-orange moving from nw towards the ocean

content.detailedDescription: First seen along a ridge, moving fast. as it crossed 11w from a distance in front of us we saw multiple lights. due to it's low flight we figured it was a helicopter. as we neared the ibew the craft moved back across and we could tell it was circular. 4 white lights (bright) were stationary and below was what appeared to be a spinning section of the craft with smaller lights that varied in color. craft glided over tree tops in a descending manner. we sped up and took the next road and it disappeared over a ridge. we attempted to locate it afterward with no success.
content.summary: Oval craft white stationary lights, multi colored spinning lights floats over trees

content.detailedDescription: I was driving on hualipai heading west near alta drive and in the south west sky, just above the mountains i noticed a white fireball looking object.  it looked like it was heading towards earth very slowly.  i noticed two jets, the ones with the long trail heading towards the thing i saw...One was heading towards it going east to west and the other jet was heading towards it from west to east.  it appeared to be by the spring mountains. i watched it as long as i could but then it disapeared behind buildings.  i wanted to go and check it out more closely but i needed to get home.  i am just very curious about it because of the meteor that was in russia today and also the meteor that came close to earth today.
content.summary: White fireball-like object seen over southwest mountains of las vegas nv

content.detailedDescription: I was standing in the driveway seeing a friend off. i noticed a vapor trail from a plane in the sky. i thought the ball of light was light reflecting off the plane, but the contrail was a ways back from it. then another ball of light appeared and moved faster than the plane. it disappeared ahead of the plane. the first light was moving the same speed as the plane and it then disappeared too. during this time i called for my friends to look but it was too late.
content.summary: Two, white objects near an airplane

content.detailedDescription: At 250 pm on friday feb 15th, i observed an employee of the state of maryland scanning the sky to the northeast of the shopping center i was driving my work vehicle at. he was pointing at something and talking to another person employed at the shopping center. i drove around to my next stop a couple hundred yards away and exited my truck. as i was walking towards a grocery store i looked up in the air and made out what at first i believed to be 2 birds hovering a thousand feet up in the air. as i watched, i noticed that neither object had any wings or appendages. they hovered silently for about 30 seconds, and then i continued into the store. when i exited the store , there was increased cloud cover and the objects could not be seen. as i reflected on the sighting, the objects did not move whatsoever, which led me to believe they were not birds or balloons. there was a slight breeze blowing so if they were balloons then they would have deviated from their posistion. also i find it difficult to beleive that 2 birds spaced about 20 yards apart could both hover with no spreading or flapping of wings. later as i was driving back to my station, i passed some balloons tethered above a shopping center a few miles east. these balloons were obvious balloons and only reached to treetop level, whereas the objects sighted earlier had no tether and were at least 1000 feet up.
content.summary: Saw someone pointing at sky , looked up and observed 2 dark objects hovering in the sky .

content.detailedDescription:
I was travelling on a205 brownhill rd. heading from the m2 towards catford london. i was in traffic so i was looking at the sky when i noticed an object very high. traffic started moving so i pulled over whilst keeping an eye on it. it was travelling really slow, at one point it looked like it had stopped. as it was getting further away it looked liked it was getting higher. lasted a good 5-10 minutes. what i could make out it was round and white. travelled in a straight line. colour of the sun reflecting of it. left no trail behind it. wasn't a plane, had no wings and it was far to high to be a helicopter. 
what i felt at the time, gob smacked, trying to work out what it could be and couldn't work it out. lost sight of it when it got to far away.
content.summary: Shape looked round, colour was like the sun reflecting of it. travelling very slow and was very high.

content.detailedDescription: Was flying from nashville to detroit. video was shot around 11am et. throughout the flight the plane made an unusual amount of turns. around 11am et i looked out the window and observed a very bright light keeping pace with our airplane. it was cloudy and the sun was above. i figured that the sun was maybe reflecting off something to generate the bright light. i took video of the bright light and as we went through clouds it appeared that clouds would go over the object and to block its light. the object then dissappeared. roughly two minutes later or so the object reappeared, figuring it was just a reflection of the sun i tilted my phone camera up to shoot the sun and caught an object above our plane. my flight was scheduled to land at 11:30, so we may have started to make our desent into detroit, our cruising altitude was 31,000 feet. if we were descedning it was in the very beginning stages of our descent when i shot the footage. i did not realize i had caught the image of the object above my plane until about 5 minutes after shooting it, and i watched the footage back. i did not have lights on at my seat when i shot the footage of the object. i am not sure what the object is, or if its a reflection of some kind. please let me know what you think.
content.features: Dome,  Window(s),  Patterned Surface,  Other,  Unknown
content.summary: Glowing orb - large object above orb - shot from airplane 30,000 plus feet.

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting in my lounge room watching a movie, i'd already seen the movie so i decided to go and take some photos of the stars i had recently got the camera and had been taking photos. 
it was 9:40 when i looked at my phone. i went outside and had my camera, i was playing with the settings when i looked up for a good shot, i looked over the house past the palm tree and to my eyes i thought i was looking at 2 brilliantly bright stars. i kept focused on them when i noticed that they were both moving. the lights were bright blue, like a shimmering blue. i looked closer shocked as i watched the two objects move across the sky towards the southwest.
the object moved in an odd path like a snake moving across the sky. the small tail it had was quickly disappearing as the object moved. then suddenly it faded and reflected off the clouds like a liquid firework but very subtle.
the whole experience lasted about 15 seconds and i was so fixated i couldn't unfortunalty get a photo as the camera wasn't on the tripod and it was such a distance to shoot. i wis i would have been outside 1 minute earlier so i could have caught the whole thing.
quite amazing and at the same time i was rocked by this.
only happened 20 minutes ago at the time of writing. 
still feeling a little odd from the whole thing.
content.summary: Odd glowing lights x 2

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
I work nights in a remote area with very little light. i first observed the lights while sitting in my work truck around 2100 hrs, they were 800-1000 meters se of my location at about 50-100 feet off the ground. i immediately got out to get a better view, the lights were only visible for approximately 5-10 seconds. not enough time to take a cell phone video. 

they were organized in a horizontal line traveling slowly to the west. i am not sure if the lights were part of a larger object or separate from one another. they emitted a very bright orange light and faded in and out sequentially, the rear light would fade out and then reappear in front. possibly indicating a rotating object? i can only speculate. if it was an aircraft it was moving to slow to achieve aerodynamic lift and i could not hear any noise. 

after the lights were gone i continued scanning the sky to see if they would reappear somewhere else. after a few minutes i spotted two orange lights hovering near a brightly lit drilling rig 5-10 miles to the west. these two moved independently of each other moving slowly in opposite directions. they were visible for about 15 seconds and were also somewhat dimmer. a few more minutes passed and i observed a single orange light hovering above the rig for around 10 seconds. 

finally after 20 minutes of continued observation i saw a dim orange light at what seemed to be a far distance(20+miles)climbing in elevation of a few thousand feet at 20-30 from my viewpoint before it faded out.

the lights seemed to be followed by two aircraft but i can't be certain. the planes appeared to be on a sw intercept course with one at low elevation and the other high. there is an airforce base nearby and their course came from that direction. the planes made a about a 50 mile loop and returned in the direction they came. not sure if their presence was related. 

i have seen similar lights before so i was sure that these were the same lights. i was pretty freaked out with the hair on my next standing up, it's not something i can explain. could be natural, man made, or of a higher intelligence. a truck driver asked if i "had seen any ufo's" about an hour earlier. i wonder if he saw the same thing.
content.summary: Bright orange lights, fading in and out for a few seconds at a time, travelling slowly
